page.title: 11CONSTANTINE RECREATION
page.content: SPORTS CLUBS;Sports groups in the Constantine district include an angling club,two badminton clubs (one at the church hall and one at the school),bowling at the Bowling green,cricket at the recreation ground(first and second teams)darts, football(first and second teams play in Falmouth/Helston league),the fox beagles meet every Saturday during season and the rugby football club meets at the Trengilly Wartha inn.GARDENING;Society shows,and the Agricultural show.There is great local interest in farming and gardening,and both shows are well attended.The Agricultural show is on the first Saturday in July.The Cottage Garden Society has monthly meetings during the Winter,and holds flower arranging classes.Every Summer there are competitions for the best kept garden.
